column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////Passed by this place a couple times and made a mental note to myself to check it out. Last Friday
column2: I was in charge of finding a lunch spot with my family and so I  was estatic for the opportunity to try out a nice place. Since my cousin I were the first to arrive
column3: we decided to snag a table. Unfortunately
column4: we waited... and waited. No table for four was available. It looked like it was about to rain
column5: so sitting outside was not an option for us. We came around 1:30 PM thinking the lunch crowd would have died down on a Friday afternoon
column6: but I was wrong. It's not a big space
column7: so finding a table was a bit difficult. We decided the wait for a table combined with the wait at the line was too much so we left and walked across the street.
